name: Axl's Adventure
description:
Keyboard Controls ----

  • WASD or arrow keys - Move
  • 'B'/LMB - Fire Harpoon
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Pause Menu / Restart Level

Co-created with Natasha Kokolakis

You'll be playing Axl, a young axolotl whose best friend Bob the blobfish has been kidnapped. You must journey into the deep sea in order to find his kidnapper and rescue Bob.

This game was made in 10 days for the Retrograde Jam
